languages.text: "Паршиво. Сдал он быстро — еще год назад кутил, хаживал на трущобные астероиды пострелять всякую шваль и мутантов, а потом раз — и слег. Догнали старые раны, эх. Ран-то у него немало было, и с прежних деньков, и почти что свежих — от покушения дюжину лет тому назад".

traits.locale_text: "Паршиво. Сдал он быстро — еще год назад кутил, хаживал на трущобные астероиды пострелять всякую шваль и мутантов, а потом раз — и слег. Догнали старые раны, эх. Ран-то у него немало было, и с прежних деньков, и почти что свежих — от покушения дюжину лет тому назад".

languages.text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."
languages.original_text: "Паршиво. Сдал он быстро — еще год назад кутил, хаживал на трущобные астероиды пострелять всякую шваль и мутантов, а потом раз — и слег. Догнали старые раны, эх. Ран-то у него немало было, и с прежних деньков, и почти что свежих — от покушения дюжину лет тому назад".

traits.locale_text: "Badly. He went to seed real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot some riffraff and mutants, and then he just up and got worse. His old wounds caught up to him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and the more recent ones — like the assassination attempt a dozen years back."

"Badly. He went to seed real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot some riffraff and mutants, and then he just up and got worse. His old wounds caught up to him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and the more recent ones — like the assassination attempt a dozen years back."

"Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... ten years back, I think it was."

"Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... ten years back, I think it was."

"Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

languages.text: “死得不怎么样，他的身体突然就急转直下了。一年前他还壮得跟头牛似的，冲进贫民窟的小行星里，开枪乱杀那些流民和变种人。然后，突然之间，他人就没了。应该是他的旧伤复发了吧……他有很多旧伤。有以前留下来的，也有最近的。比如说，之前有人打算弄死他……我想想， 那应该是十二年前的事情了。”
languages.original_text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

traits.locale_text: “死得不怎么样，他的身体突然就急转直下了。一年前他还壮得跟头牛似的，冲进贫民窟的小行星里，开枪乱杀那些流民和变种人。然后，突然之间，他人就没了。应该是他的旧伤复发了吧……他有很多旧伤。有以前留下来的，也有最近的。比如说，之前有人打算弄死他……我想想， 那应该是十二年前的事情了。”

languages.text: «Mal. Se fue a pique muy rápido: hace un año, aún estaba viviendo la vida, visitando los asteroides suburbanos para disparar a la chusma y a los mutantes, y, de repente, no podía más. Sus viejas heridas se lo llevaron... y tenía muchas, tanto de los viejos tiempos como más recientes, como las de aquella vez que intentaron matarlo... hará doce años, creo».
languages.original_text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

traits.locale_text: «Mal. Se fue a pique muy rápido: hace un año, aún estaba viviendo la vida, visitando los asteroides suburbanos para disparar a la chusma y a los mutantes, y, de repente, no podía más. Sus viejas heridas se lo llevaron... y tenía muchas, tanto de los viejos tiempos como más recientes, como las de aquella vez que intentaron matarlo... hará doce años, creo».

languages.text: 「酷いもんだったよ。あいつはあっという間に落ちぶれていった――ほんの1年前まではスラムの小惑星を荒らしまわって、ならず者や変異体を撃ち殺して生きていたのに、突然、廃人のようになってしまった。古傷が身体を蝕んでしまったんだろう…しかも、昔ついた傷もあれば最近に傷もあった。12年前だったかな…誰かがあいつを殺そうとした時にできたものもあったねえ」
languages.original_text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

traits.locale_text: 「酷いもんだったよ。あいつはあっという間に落ちぶれていった――ほんの1年前まではスラムの小惑星を荒らしまわって、ならず者や変異体を撃ち殺して生きていたのに、突然、廃人のようになってしまった。古傷が身体を蝕んでしまったんだろう…しかも、昔ついた傷もあれば最近に傷もあった。12年前だったかな…誰かがあいつを殺そうとした時にできたものもあったねえ」

languages.text: "Unschön. Es ging schnell bergab mit ihn – noch vor einem Jahr stürmte er voller Energie die Slum-Asteroiden, um Gesocks und Mutanten zu erschießen, und plötzlich war er am Ende. Seine alten Verwundungen hatten ihn wieder eingeholt ... Und von denen er hatte er eine ganze Menge, aus alten Tagen und auch neuere, zum Beispiel von einem Anschlag auf ihn ... vor zwölf Jahren, glaube ich."
languages.original_text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

traits.locale_text: "Unschön. Es ging schnell bergab mit ihn – noch vor einem Jahr stürmte er voller Energie die Slum-Asteroiden, um Gesocks und Mutanten zu erschießen, und plötzlich war er am Ende. Seine alten Verwundungen hatten ihn wieder eingeholt ... Und von denen er hatte er eine ganze Menge, aus alten Tagen und auch neuere, zum Beispiel von einem Anschlag auf ihn ... vor zwölf Jahren, glaube ich."

languages.text: « Ce n'était pas beau à voir, et c'est allé très vite. Il y a un an à peine, il passait encore son temps à faire des descentes dans les taudis des astéroïdes pour canarder la racaille et les mutants, et puis du jour au lendemain, c'était fini. Ses vieilles blessures l'ont rattrapé... Il faut dire qu'il en avait un bon nombre, récentes comme anciennes, comme celles dont il a écopé quand quelqu'un a essayé de le liquider... il y a une douzaine d'années, si je me souviens bien. »
languages.original_text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était pas beau à voir, et c'est allé très vite. Il y a un an à peine, il passait encore son temps à faire des descentes dans les taudis des astéroïdes pour canarder la racaille et les mutants, et puis du jour au lendemain, c'était fini. Ses vieilles blessures l'ont rattrapé... Il faut dire qu'il en avait un bon nombre, récentes comme anciennes, comme celles dont il a écopé quand quelqu'un a essayé de le liquider... il y a une douzaine d'années, si je me souviens bien. »

languages.text: "Berbat şekilde. Sağlığı hızla bozuldu. Daha bir yıl önce hayat doluydu, çapulcu ve mutant vurmak için gecekondu asteroitlerini basardı. Ne olduysa bir anda oldu. Eski yaraları tekrar alevlendi. Ee, ne de olsa yarası boldu. Eski günlerden kalma olsun, yenileri olsun. Mesela onu öldürmeye kalktıkları seferden kalan... On iki yıl önceydi galiba."
languages.original_text: "Badly. He went downhill real fast — just a year ago, he was still living it up, storming the slum asteroids to shoot riffraff and mutants, and then all of a sudden, he was done. His old wounds had caught up with him... And he had plenty of those, both from the old days and more recent ones, like when somebody tried to bump him off... twelve years back, I think it was."

traits.locale_text: "Korkunçtu. Hızla kendini kaybetti. Daha bir yıl öncesinde neşe doluydu, çapulcu ve mutant vurmak için gecekondu asteroidlerini basardı. Sonra aniden kendini kapattı. Eski yaraları yeniden alevlendi. Onda yara boldu. Hem eski günlerden hem de yakın zamanlardan, hani şu onu öldürmeye çalıştıkları gibi... On iki yıl önceydi sanırım."
